name: CybarbZ the Age of Gnargorg
description:
CybarbZ the Age of Gnargorg is a 2D platformer with a focus on intense combat and gore.

You are CybarbZ a cyborg from the planet Barbarella and humanitys last chance at striking down the evil overlord Gnargorg who is enslaving the human race and invading planet Earth

This game was developed as part of a Game development course in the Turku University of applied sciences.

Our team consist of 5 members with multiple talents and a passion for making games and becoming better at what we do.
